title: Can't acess the store
body: When ever I go to the store my league of legends go's black and all the store options are in blue writing  the game it self is working just the store isn't working

replies.body:
You are on Windows, yes?

Try the following: Open up your Internet Options (either from Control Panel or from Internet Explorer itself) and reset them to their defaults. Then, go to Security and set the level to Medium-Low.

Hey Deadspec,

Does this happen all the time, or is this a new issue you are seeing?
This a new issue that's just started happening I haven't downloaded any new programs that might be doing this also
Oh I reinstalled league and now I can view the store but when I click on buy champions ect it just crashes. also this happens all the time and I was hoping on buying the bard bundle today
I used to get this randomly too. Since upgrading my router / modem it doesn't happen anymore.
